**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion NoZeroDivisors α ↔ (IsDomain α ∨ Subsingleton α) := by ```

This only needs:
```suggestion
instance Subsingleton.to_noZeroDivisors [Mul α] [Zero α] [Subsingleton α] : NoZeroDivisors α :=
```
